name: Rhythm Rush!
description: Play your own songs to three different game modes on, newly updated to, eight different maps, or fight the three unlockable bosses! Play on four different difficulties to get a range of challenge! Keep track of your stats and compare them to your friends! Earn all the achievements by playing and getting better at it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (x32 bit) Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4300U CPU @ 1.90 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
